name: Perfect Ponds Water Gardens & Fountains Store
description: Offers a complete selection of products
overview: PerfectPonds.com offers a complete selection of products for your pond and water gardening needs. Basic items like pumps, filters, liners, and tubing are available in different brands. We have preformed pond kits for beginners as well as accessories like fountains, waterfalls, lights and decors to enhance the beauty of your water garden ponds. Samuel Fahne, owner of Perfect Ponds, is a dedicated environmentalist and nature-lover who advocates for the preservation and enhancement of the environment through natural garden landscaping. An architect by profession, he has also been working as a landscape designer specializing in botanical gardens, parks, and nature preserves.
